attributes.action: Hold a referendum on how the public want to deal with ongoing corona virus
attributes.background: Give power to public to make there own decisions

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be a vote on how to deal with the Covid-19 outbreak, but we're not sure exactly what you want the public to be asked to vote on.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold a public vote on any future lockdown plans after the road map completion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583960

No new lockdowns longer than 3 weeks without a referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584994
